resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Adhesive Slime
entries: The farastu secretes a thick, tarlike slime and it can choose to use this slime to secure enemies that it has {@condition grappled} or to make weapons become attached to it. It is able to end the adhesion with a bonus action, causing all items and creatures secured to it to be released. The adhesion also ends after the farastu dies.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the farastu's darkvision.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The farastu has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The farastu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The farastu's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the farastu can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The farastu makes two claw or bite attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage. The target is held fast by the farastu's adhesive slime ({@condition grappled}, escape {@dc 15}) if the farastu isn't already grappling a creature.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Adhesive Hide
entries: After taking damage from a melee weapon, the farastu can use its reaction to take the weapon, if the attacker fails a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. The weapon is attached to the farastu's hide until it releases the weapon, or an attacker takes an action and succeeds with a {@dc 15} Strength check to pry it off the farastu.
